Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Hotel”
Reviews.Author: catalina_andra
Reviews.Content: arrived barcelona amazing city stayed 4 nights 3 stars hotel little bigger star hotel amazing nice staff front desk ones changed towels single day served perfectly breakfast impressed staff friendly helpfull clean everyday changed towels bath foam garbage removal hotel eixample district couple blocks urgell metro station red line l1 bus 59 closer takes catalunya rambla pg maritime station barceloneta beach lows smalls overall consideration heating system makes little noise wonderful bath nice cousy marble nearby hotel restaurants grocery fruit shops supermarkets strongly recommend mercat de la boqueria real taste barcelona thank century park hotel wonderful staying

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Century Park: good place for a visit to Barcelona”
Reviews.Author: Ivan61Sofia_Bulgaria
Reviews.Content: id recommend hotel chipper location example district close metro bus stations staff kindly didnt breakfast nearby nice cafe excellent croissants coffee free wi fi id suggested diner nice la

Reviews.Title: “HOTEL CENTURY PARK”
Reviews.Author: Deirdrebip
Reviews.Content: loved hotel century park hotel sense real barcelona restaurants bars frequented locals prices cheaper speaking little spanish necessity times hotel public transport links staff helpful friendly clean perfectly adequate value price paid visit sagrada familia queues extremely helpful security guard explained bought tickets caixa able walk straight waiting atm machine situated inside caixa simple process book tickets lots events booked avoid wasting holiday lines note hotel book tickets definitely return hotel century park barcelona dee

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable hotel with helpful, polite staff.”
Reviews.Author: mariaant
Reviews.Content: dropped hotel 2am 2 hours journey girona airport pleasantly surprised modern reception restaurantcafe night receptionist helpful polite 5th floor little aback twin beds instead double booked dated bathroom throwback 70s bed comfortable slept baby night clean main dont visitors 5th floor quiet walls thin expect noisy pleased overall free internet access reception staff helpful polite hotel wasnt nearest 2 metro stations 10 minute walk late night shops nearby drinks snacks buy day definitely recommend simple clean hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good basic hotel well located”
Reviews.Author: jackjohn30
Reviews.Content: friendly helpful staff nice breakfast value basic location little tourist core allows little true regional culture easy walking distance activate electrical system putting key slot little figure

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money”
Reviews.Author: taniutzzza
Reviews.Content: booked hotel 6 months advance rate 68 enight double breakfast included hotel 15 min walk ramblas walks located pictures look nice basic little continental breakfast service rate 68 enight double breakfast included recomand

Reviews.Title: “Value for money”
Reviews.Author: sweety_g_bg
Reviews.Content: hotel located plaza espania plaza catalunia 15 min walk metro 10 min walk breakfast varied tomatoes vegetables count luggage reception pc free internet available reception 20 min bring valuables

Reviews.Title: “very nice hotel, good value for money”
Reviews.Author: DINA_greece18
Reviews.Content: stayed century park hotel 6 days june boyfriend bit sceptical mainly due negative reviews site pleasantly spacious clean breakfast adequate lounge found free table stuff hepfull willing tips city downside hotel busy street cant windows rush hours noisy windows closed soundproofing excellent bit rambla centre city metro station 3 blocks deal overall value money definatly reccomend tight budget

Reviews.Title: “Amazing value!”
Reviews.Author: Billyjo25
Reviews.Content: somewhat anxious prior arrival hotel due mainly reasonable rate negative feedback site surprised efficient recieved helpful information arrival simply furnished exceptionally clean free inroom safe bonus considering stories heard pickpockets etc barcelona cold buffet breakfast perfectly adequate replenished regularly recommend
